lyrics:
5 contributorsgetting ready lyricsverse 1
oh baby im getting ready
im getting ready to let you go
my hands are shaking
my hearts unsteady
oh how i once loved you so

verse 2
i know all the magics gone
wish i had a magic wand
i would put a spell on you
you would see it as i do

chorus 1
oh im getting ready to let you go
oh im getting ready to let you go

verse 3
oh baby youre my drug
i was just your cigarette
i was nothing you could be proud of
i have lost my self respect
my self respect self respect
i have lost my self respect

chorus 1
oh oh im getting ready to let you go
im getting ready to let you go
oh oh im getting ready to let you go
im getting ready im getting ready
see miranda lambert liveget tickets as low as 90you might also likeverse 4
oh baby baby i got no traction
ive been waitin and waitin for your reaction
so i tried a new direction
im gonna give myself a resurrection

chorus 2
im getting ready im getting ready
im getting ready to let you go
im getting ready to let you go
im getting ready im getting ready
im getting ready to let you go let you go
let you go1embed
